pageSetting.title: 跨机构存贷款业绩明细

select.isEqual: select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp , zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =1 where zh.gxhslx='1' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , '百分比:100' as gxfp , zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =1 where zh.gxhslx='0' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc

select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp, zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 where zh.gxhslx='1'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:100' as gxfp,zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 where zh.gxhslx='0'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc

select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp , zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =2 where zh.gxhslx='1' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , '百分比:100' as gxfp , zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =2 where zh.gxhslx='0' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc

select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp, zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 where zh.gxhslx='1'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:100' as gxfp,zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 where zh.gxhslx='0'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp , zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =1 where zh.gxhslx='1' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , '百分比:100' as gxfp , zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =1 where zh.gxhslx='0' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc
select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp, zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 where zh.gxhslx='1'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:100' as gxfp,zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 1 where zh.gxhslx='0'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc
select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp , zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =2 where zh.gxhslx='1' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc , '百分比:100' as gxfp , zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and jxdxlx =2 where zh.gxhslx='0' and khjg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh<>jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc
select $tjrq$ as tjrq,khh,zhdh,zhhm,khjg,ssjg,hydh,hymc,gxfp,zhye,qsrq,jsrq,bz,kmh,qx,khrq,dqrq,xhrq from( select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, case when gx.gxhslx='1' then '百分比:'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) else '阈值:'||F_NumToChar(gx.yz)||',阈值以下:'||F_NumToChar(gx.clbl)||',阈值以上'||F_NumToChar(gx.zlbl) end as gxfp, zh.zhye,gx.qsrq,gx.jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on gx.jxdxdh = zh.jxdxdh and $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 where zh.gxhslx='1'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' union all select zh.khh,zh.zhdh,zh.zhhm,khjg.jgmc as khjg,jg.jgmc as ssjg,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, '百分比:100' as gxfp,zh.zhye,19000101 as qsrq,29991231 as jsrq,bz.bzzwmc bz,zh.kmh,coalesce(qx.qxmc, zh.qx) as qx,zh.khrq,zh.dqrq,zh.xhrq from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg khjg on khjg.jgdh = zh.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = zh.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on cy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = cy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=zh.bz left outer join csb_qxsdb qx on zh.qx between qx.qsqx and qx.jsqx and qx.jxdxlx = 2 where zh.gxhslx='0'and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and khjg.khdxdh != jg.khdxdh and zh.zhhm like '%$khmc$%' )a order by qsrq desc ) t
